Ritualist:Vendetta.NAME: Vendetta
Ritualist:Vendetta.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, apply !M! warlock:Possession to all enemies and gain 2 warlock:Attunement.

Ritualist:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual
Ritualist:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: 2 warlock:Ritual. NL Gain [G] [G]. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.
Ritualist:DarkRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 warlock:Ritual. NL Gain [G] [G]. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

Ritualist:SummonAgiel.NAME: Summon Agiel
Ritualist:SummonAgiel.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Agiel. Deal !D! damage. NL warlock:Banish: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ScaryShank.NAME: Scary Shank
Ritualist:ScaryShank.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.NAME: Ritual Bloodletter
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card, gain [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card in hand, NL Gain [G] [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.

Ritualist:CutOut.NAME: Cut Out
Ritualist:CutOut.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-Ritual cards in your hand. Deal !D! damage. If this is your last card, gain !M! HP.

Ritualist:BarrierOfBone.NAME: Barrier of Bone
Ritualist:BarrierOfBone.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Banish. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Discard !M! cards.

Ritualist:EmptyPalms.NAME: Empty Palms
Ritualist:EmptyPalms.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, when you have no cards in hand, gain !M! Block.

Ritualist:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
Ritualist:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Ritual, gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:ImpFeast.NAME: Imp Feast
Ritualist:ImpFeast.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose 7 Strength this turn and gain !M! warlock:Possession. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:Celerity.NAME: Celerity
Ritualist:Celerity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. This card triggers it's effects when discarded or exhausted by another card. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.NAME: Costly Preparation
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Lose up to 3 warlock:Attunement. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 warlock:Ritual. NL Lose up to 3 warlock:Attunement. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.

Ritualist:TemporalRites.NAME: Temporal Rites
Ritualist:TemporalRites.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Draw all Rituals from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ScoutAhead.NAME: Scout Ahead
Ritualist:ScoutAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:BranchingPaths.NAME: Branching Paths
Ritualist:BranchingPaths.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:SoulOpening.NAME: Soul Opening
Ritualist:SoulOpening.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL If target is Possessed, apply !M! warlock:Possession.

Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.NAME: Twisted Ecstasy
Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, your Rituals cost 0. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, your Rituals cost 0. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:MassDrainLife.NAME: Mass Drain Life
Ritualist:MassDrainLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to and consume all warlock:Possession from each enemy. Heal HP equal to the amount consumed. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:MassDrainLife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage (+ !M!) equal to and consume all warlock:Possession from each enemy. Heal HP equal to the amount consumed. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.NAME: Pull From Beyond
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust and discard pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.NAME: Thoughtful Art
Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played more than !M! cards this turn, gain !B! Block again and draw 1 card.

Ritualist:PowerPact.NAME: Power Pact
Ritualist:PowerPact.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Strength. In three turns lose !M+2! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.NAME: Deadly Velocity
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card gain !M! Strength and every 3 cards gain !M! Dexterity, until the end of the turn.
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a card gain !M! Strength and every 2 cards gain !M! Dexterity, until the end of the turn.

Ritualist:DemonArm.NAME: Demon Arm
Ritualist:DemonArm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, deal !M! damage to 1 random enemy.

Ritualist:WinningGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Discard your hand. Play the top card of your draw pile.

Ritualist:LongCon.NAME: Long Con
Ritualist:LongCon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. In two turns, gain [G] [G].

Ritualist:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
Ritualist:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of it and upgrade it.
Ritualist:Retreat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile on top of it and upgrade them.

Ritualist:DrainStrength.NAME: Drain Strength
Ritualist:DrainStrength.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! warlock:Possession from an enemy. Gain that much Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.NAME: Cleanse By Blood
Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Banish. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:GrowingRites.NAME: Growing Rites
Ritualist:GrowingRites.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! warlock:Attunement.
Ritualist:GrowingRites.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! warlock:Attunement.

Ritualist:DuskSeeker.NAME: Dusk Seeker
Ritualist:DuskSeeker.DESCRIPTION: You choose !M! card you draw each turn.

Ritualist:Arrival.NAME: Arrival
Ritualist:Arrival.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. Retain. NL Put 1 Summon card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:Arrival.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. warlock:Ritual. NL Put 1 Summon card from your discard and draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:TwinWave.NAME: Twin Wave
Ritualist:TwinWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. At the start of your next turn, repeat.

Ritualist:StrategicCut.NAME: Strategic Cut
Ritualist:StrategicCut.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

Ritualist:SpreadingCurse.NAME: Spreading Curse
Ritualist:SpreadingCurse.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! warlock:Possession to ALL enemies.

Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.NAME: Summon Baphomet
Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Baphomet. Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL warlock:Summon: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL warlock:Summon: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:TransientGhost.NAME: Transient Ghost

Ritualist:Impale.NAME: Impale
Ritualist:Impale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have an active warlock:Summon, deal !M! more.

Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.NAME: Deadly Blows
Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a random card.
Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a card.

Ritualist:EvilIntentions.NAME: Evil Intentions
Ritualist:EvilIntentions.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards. NL Gain [G] [G] [G]. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:BloodBoil.NAME: Blood Boil
Ritualist:BloodBoil.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. Retain. NL Gain [G] . If you retain this card lose !M! life and gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Ritualist:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Each time you play !M! cards gain [G].
Ritualist:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each time you play !M! cards gain [G].

Ritualist:CostlyStrength.NAME: Costly Strength
Ritualist:CostlyStrength.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Lose up to 5 warlock:Attunement. Gain twice that much Strength next turn only.
Ritualist:CostlyStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 warlock:Ritual. NL Lose up to 5 warlock:Attunement. Gain twice that much Strength next turn only.

Ritualist:ShallowCut.NAME: Shallow Cut
Ritualist:ShallowCut.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw !M! card.

Ritualist:SummonRerek.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Rerek. Deal !D! damage to all enemies, then deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times. NL warlock:Banish: Deal !M! to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:QuietMeditation.NAME: Quiet Meditation
Ritualist:QuietMeditation.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random Ritual card to your hand.
Ritualist:QuietMeditation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random Ritual card to your hand.

Ritualist:RudeInterruption.NAME: Rude Interruption
Ritualist:RudeInterruption.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, they lose !M! Strength this turn and apply 4 warlock:Possession.

Ritualist:IndKnifing.NAME: Indiscriminated
Ritualist:IndKnifing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy !M! times.

Ritualist:Repatriate.NAME: Repatriate
Ritualist:Repatriate.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Banish !M! times. Channel a random demon with the same warlock:Banish value. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:EarlyReturn.NAME: Early Return
Ritualist:EarlyReturn.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Banish. NL Costs 1 less this turn for each warlock:Ritual played this turn. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Ritualist:Sabbath.NAME: Sabbath
Ritualist:Sabbath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a warlock:Ritual, gain !M! warlock:Attunement.
Ritualist:Sabbath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a warlock:Ritual, gain !M! warlock:Attunement.

Ritualist:DeepReserves.NAME: Deep Reserves
Ritualist:DeepReserves.DESCRIPTION: Increase your max hand size by !M!. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards.

Ritualist:SummonMaat.NAME: Summon Ma'at
Ritualist:SummonMaat.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ma'at. Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns at the end of your next 3 turns. Lose the gained Thorns after. NL warlock:Banish: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:SummonNergal.NAME: Summon Nergal
Ritualist:SummonNergal.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Nergal. Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, warlock:Possession, and Strength down(for one turn) to all enemies. NL warlock:Banish: Apply !M! warlock:Possession to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:BurstParasite.NAME: Burst Parasite
Ritualist:BurstParasite.DESCRIPTION: Infect the target with a parasite. Whenever they have  warlock:Possession applied to them, deal !M! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:HeavyInfection.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! warlock:Possession. NL This card functions as an attack, and scales with Strength.

Ritualist:SoulParasite.NAME: Soul Parasite
Ritualist:SoulParasite.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain Soul Parasites equal to their possession. NL Soul Parasites apply Possession at the start of each of their turns. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DarkMasterForm.NAME: Dark Master Form
Ritualist:DarkMasterForm.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Summons cost 1 less. When you play a warlock:Summon, add 1 random warlock:Summon to your deck and gain !M! warlock:Attunement.

Ritualist:Extradition.NAME: Extradition
Ritualist:Extradition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy dies before your next turn transfer their warlock:Possession to a random enemy.

Ritualist:EnergyGem.NAME: Energy Gem
Ritualist:EnergyGem.DESCRIPTION: Gain [G]. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:EnergyGem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [G]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Sight
Ritualist:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Shuffle !M! Energy Gems into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DevilWill.NAME: Devil's Will
Ritualist:DevilWill.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw cards from your discard pile until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:PoweredBarrier.NAME: Powered Barrier
Ritualist:PoweredBarrier.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, convert your remaining [G] into !M! Block each.

Ritualist:ViolentFlux.NAME: Violent Flux
Ritualist:ViolentFlux.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to the closest enemy, then deal that damage plus !M! to the next enemy, repeating.

Ritualist:Symbiote.NAME: Symbiote
Ritualist:Symbiote.DESCRIPTION: Select a warlock:Summon. This combat, it doesn't exhaust and returns it's warlock:Attunement cost at the end of your turn.
Ritualist:Symbiote.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Select a warlock:Summon. This combat, it doesn't exhaust and returns it's warlock:Attunement cost at the end of your turn.

Ritualist:BloodyVigor.NAME: Bloody Vigor
Ritualist:BloodyVigor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, discard 1 card and gain !M! Strength.

Ritualist:DeliriumWill.NAME: Delirium Will
Ritualist:DeliriumWill.DESCRIPTION: 3 warlock:Ritual. NL Add 2 Soul Wards to your hand. At the start of your next !M! turns, add a Soul Ward to your hand.
Ritualist:DeliriumWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 3 warlock:Ritual. NL Add 2 Soul Wards+ to your hand. At the start of your next !M! turns, add a Soul Ward+ to your hand.

Ritualist:SmokeRises.NAME: Smoke Rises
Ritualist:SmokeRises.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Permanently increase this card's Damage by !M!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Ritualist:Galvanize.NAME: Galvanize
Ritualist:Galvanize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase your warlock:Attunement by !M!%. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:Peace.NAME: Peace
Ritualist:Peace.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. Until the end of your next turn, you can't block. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ThroughTheBreach.NAME: Through the Breach
Ritualist:ThroughTheBreach.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your deck. Shuffle a Summon Baphomet into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:Tenderize.NAME: Tenderize
Ritualist:Tenderize.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Ritualist:StygianWellspring.NAME: Stygian Wellspring
Ritualist:StygianWellspring.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Warlock card to your hand at the start of your next X turns, it costs 0. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:StygianWellspring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Warlock card to your hand at the start of your next X+1 turns, it costs 0. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:Hex.NAME: Hex
Ritualist:Hex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! warlock:Possession, exhaust a card. If that card is a Curse, apply 4 warlock:Possession again.

Ritualist:Ouroboros.NAME: Ouroboros
Ritualist:Ouroboros.DESCRIPTION: Cycle between gaining !M! Block and dealing !M! damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn. Increases by 1 every cycle.
Ritualist:Ouroboros.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cycle between gaining !M! Block and dealing !M! damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn. Increases by 1 every cycle.

Ritualist:BookOfNames.NAME: Book Of Names
Ritualist:BookOfNames.DESCRIPTION: !M! warlock:Ritual. NL Add a copy of each warlock:Summon to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:BookOfNames.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: !M! warlock:Ritual. NL Add a copy of each warlock:Summon to your discard pile.

Ritualist:DoubleVision.NAME: Double Vision
Ritualist:DoubleVision.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! warlock:Summon you play this turn is played twice. NL Exhaust.
